goals__remit: BioBridge® was founded in 1989 in Cambridge UK by Mr Meredith Lloyd-Evans. BioBridge focuses on understanding and overcoming barriers to commercialisation for innovation in bioscience technologies and products and its work spans the entire product chain from discovery development to market entry. Its clients: companies, individuals, HEIs and public bodies - are in healthcare, biotechnology, medical devices, biomaterials, agricultural resources, animal health, ‘green’ and ‘blue’ industries and food.
